Servers.ServerGroup:
Gnamod World features an all new RWG world based on the vanilla RWG world of 7 Days to Die. This world comes with tailored and improved biomes, new spawning rules for POIs, height based biome painting, all new terrain generation that features a diverse landscape with tall mountains, rolling hills and various other landscapes such as crater lakes. This mod also comes with a balanced all new loot generation that increases the challenge of the game while preserving the vanilla feel of the game. The zombie spawning is also tailored to fit the world among with some other tweaks such as improved stock for traders and some balance changes. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
This is the default experience of Gnamod World.
https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?55377-GNAMOD-World-Improved-of-RWG-world-Improved-loot-balance-Improved-spawns
https://github.com/haidrgna/Gnamod-World/archive/master.zip https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haidrgna/Gnamod-World/master/Gnamod%20World%20Standalone/Options/World%20Sizes/Large%20World/rwgmixer.xml
Gnamod World features an all new RWG world based on the vanilla RWG world of 7 Days to Die. This world comes with tailored and improved biomes, new spawning rules for POIs, height based biome painting, all new terrain generation that features a diverse landscape with tall mountains, rolling hills and various other landscapes such as crater lakes. This mod also comes with a balanced all new loot generation that increases the challenge of the game while preserving the vanilla feel of the game. The zombie spawning is also tailored to fit the world among with some other tweaks such as improved stock for traders and some balance changes. World size is Huge (12500 block radius).
This variation comes with a bigger world.
https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?55377-GNAMOD-World-Improved-of-RWG-world-Improved-loot-balance-Improved-spawns
https://github.com/haidrgna/Gnamod-World/archive/master.zip https://raw.githubusercontent.com/haidrgna/Gnamod-World/master/Gnamod%20World%20Standalone/Options/World%20Sizes/Huge%20World/rwgmixer.xml

ot yet on github, this version is a simplified version of my mod that only mildly tweaks vanilla and adds my world to it. The Valmod Tweak does the same for Valmar's Valmod Overhaul. I am not yet sure we need to add these to the launcher so thats why I did not yet add them to github. -->

Server.Name: Easy
Server.Description:
Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode is a variation on Gnamod World where players start out with a randomized starting kit and have them survive as a nomad trekking around the world. In this mode building is severely limited and most construction is gated behind the workbench. This mode creates an unique challenging gameplay where you will move from location to location seeking shelter during the night and traveling during the day looking for valuables and food. This mode can be played solo, with friends and could even be used as a basis for a PvP server. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
In this variation of Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode the zombies will not climb, this mode is designed for people that like it a bit easier.

Server.Name: Normal
Server.Description:
Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode is a variation on Gnamod World where players start out with a randomized starting kit and have them survive as a nomad trekking around the world. In this mode building is severely limited and most construction is gated behind the workbench. This mode creates an unique challenging gameplay where you will move from location to location seeking shelter during the night and traveling during the day looking for valuables and food. This mode can be played solo, with friends and could even be used as a basis for a PvP server. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
This variation is the default experience of Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode.

Server.Name: Hard
Server.Description:
Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode is a variation on Gnamod World where players start out with a randomized starting kit and have them survive as a nomad trekking around the world. In this mode building is severely limited and most construction is gated behind the workbench. This mode creates an unique challenging gameplay where you will move from location to location seeking shelter during the night and traveling during the day looking for valuables and food. This mode can be played solo, with friends and could even be used as a basis for a PvP server. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
In this variation of Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode the amount of zombies spawned in the world will be increased, this version is meant for teams of up to 4 players or players seeking a challenge.

Server.Name: Very Hard
Server.Description:

In this mode building is severely limited and most construction is gated behind the workbench. This mode creates an unique challenging gameplay where you will move from location to location seeking shelter during the night and traveling during the day looking for valuables and food. This mode can be played solo, with friends and could even be used as a basis for a PvP server. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
In this variation of Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode the amount of zombies spawned in the world will be very high, this version is for big teams or real diehards.

Server.Name: Insane
Server.Description:

This mode can be played solo, with friends and could even be used as a basis for a PvP server. World size is Large (10000 block radius).
In this variation of Gnamod Ultra Nomad Mode the amount of zombies spawned in the world be on insane levels, this version is only for large teams of real diehards.

ServerGroup.Name: Gnamod Necropolis
ServerGroup.Description: Haidrgna Gnamod Necropolis Mods with various combinations!

Server.Name: Classic
Server.Description:
Gnamod Necropolis is a NEW RWG World created using the knowledge gained while working on Gnamod World and Ultra Nomad Mode. It creates an all new world that features a bleak and desolate post apocalyptic wasteland world. In this world you will not find any green biomes or places to hide. You find yourself in the remains of sprawling metropolis, a zone that is not consumed by the radiation that surrounds it. The weather has been affected and so have its inhabitants, which come out of their radiation hideouts at night to feed on any remaining survivors.
Can you survive in this Wasteland?

Server.Description:
